text: Anna Pellissier (born 24 March 1927) was an Italian alpine skier. She competed in three events at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Italian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Aosta Valley
title: Anna Pellissier
